CustomField.description: Stocking type: Maintained by u-blox with the goal to ensure turn business. Only products in status IP or MP can be stocking types (to be checked in the product consistency reports Non-stocking type: Product is only produced upon receipt of an order. Products in EOL are automatically none-stocking types. Customer product: It is automatically Non-stocking type. Custom products are not visible to distributors.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Stocking type: Maintained by u-blox. (Only products in status IP or MP) Non-stocking type: Product is only produced upon receipt of an order. Custom product: This is also Non-stocking type. Not visible to distributors.
CustomField.label: Logistics
